About TunnelForge Desktop

TunnelForge Desktop provides a native interface for managing your terminal sharing sessions. Built with Tauri for cross-platform compatibility.

Version 1.0.0

CLI Installation

Install the TunnelForge command-line tool for terminal access.

CLI Usage

# Start a new terminal session
tunnelforge start

# Join an existing session
tunnelforge join <session-id>

# List active sessions
tunnelforge list
